I had a disaster when I did an in place distribution upgrade. Its safer to do a clean install

The other reason it would be good to start from scratch is that the EXT4 file system is faster than EXT3 and if you upgrade a file system from 3 to 4 you dont get the full performance benefit. Or so I read anyway
